page.title: 13Children's Games.
page.content: Children at home and school play the following games:French skipping,tag, marbles,kick-about,rounders,cricket, football,tennis,French cricket,netball pinball,hide 'n seek,skipping,pop star chase,O'Grady says and off-ground touch. Some children have games on their home computers or video games for their T.V.sets. For{French skipping}you need a long piece of elastic knotted into a circle. 3 or more people may play. Two players stand one each end with the elastic around their ankles. Then the third player jumps in and out chanting a rhyme, such as "England,Ireland, Scotland,Wales.In-bobble,Out-bobble,om pom poufay".If she succeeds in jumping the elastic it is raised higher until she is out. To play{marbles,}you roll them along a drain cover in the play- ground,obeying certain rules.
